definition: abbr. for 論語|论语[Lun2 yu3], The Analects (of Confucius)
opinion/view/theory/doctrine/to discuss/to talk about/to regard/to consider/per/by the (kilometer, hour etc)

sentences.english: This very issue actually renders a bit odd the debate between Qiu and Xue.
sentences.chinese: 這也是秋風與薛湧的論戰堪稱奇怪之處。

sentences.english: The immediate war was over, that really was what the cultural wars were about.
sentences.chinese: 緊迫感沒有了，當時的文化論戰也就告一段落了。

sentences.english: The teachings of Arminius got their start in the Holland because of the double election controversy.
sentences.chinese: 因爲雙重揀選的論戰，阿民唸的教導在荷蘭開始。
你可能聽過這樣一場論戰。

sentences.english: Yet Mr Gomaa himself is no stranger to controversy.
sentences.chinese: 然而，戈瑪自己對論戰也並不陌生。

sentences.english: Adeimantus And that is where the brother, Adeimantus, joins in.
sentences.chinese: 這也是其兄弟，加入論戰的時刻。

sentences.english: Section three illustrates the history impact and lessons of Sino-Soviet debate.
sentences.chinese: 第三部分論述了中蘇論戰的歷史影響和教訓。

sentences.english: And ACLS has the humanities organization, was front and center in the cultural wars.
sentences.chinese: 而ACLS有人文組織，是文化論戰的前沿陣地。

sentences.english: But there was a larger animosity at work in her polemics.
sentences.chinese: 但是她的論戰中潛伏着更大的敵意。

sentences.english: The debate has also promoted the formation and development of the later period of the classical school.
sentences.chinese: 兩派論戰還促進了後期古典學派的形成和發展。

sentences.english: Pinko dogmatism is the most remarkable character of the controversy.
sentences.chinese: 中蘇大論戰最大的特點是左傾教條主義。

sentences.english: This is a heated debate which involves materialist as opposed to idealist views.
sentences.chinese: 這是一場唯物主義與唯心主義的大論戰。

sentences.english: And this is where the rubber hits the road.
sentences.chinese: 這是論戰真正開始的地方。

sentences.english: Now stop with all the polemics , because we love F1.
sentences.chinese: 現在停止所有的論戰，因爲我們都熱愛F1。

sentences.english: A liberal is a man too broadminded to take his own side in a quarrel.
sentences.chinese: 自由黨人就是思想太開明而在論戰中沒立場的人。

sentences.english: You must stop this quarrelsomeness and not bait great men.
sentences.chinese: 你應該停止這種論戰，別再向大人物們挑釁了。

definition: to take an alternate route (idiom)/to find an alternative/to take a different approach/to blaze a new trail
May Fourth Movement/Chinese national renewal movement that started with 4th May 1919 protest against the Treaty of Versailles
different routes to the same destination (idiom); fig. different means of achieve the same end
social movement/abbr. for 社會運動|社会运动
to avoid the important and dwell on the trivial/to keep silent about major charges while admitting minor ones
to run a newspaper/to publish a newspaper
could happen at any moment/on the verge
